name: Untitled Gregynog Game
description:
pls maximise

Francois Viete, the guy who added letters to maths, is in the running to be the next British Prime Minister. Can he prove himself worthy and escape Hell, or will he be damned for eternity along with people who complain about pineapple on pizza?

Includes Linux, Windows and MacOS but has only been tested on Linux(X11) and Windows10. Made in 2 1/2 days for this game jam.
